sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-button @click="actuate('left')">left</b-button>
  <b-button @click="actuate('center')">center</b-button>
  <b-button @click="actuate('right')">right</b-button>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'
export default {
  name: 'ControlPad',
  methods: {
    actuate: function (direction) {
      axios.post('http://' + window.location.hostname + ':8000/actuate', { params: { direction: direction } })
        .then(response => this.responseData = response.data)
    }
  }
}
</script>
